41: The meteorological station of Xiuyu District, Putian City, Fujian Province issued a yellow warning signal for strong winds. The meteorological station of Xiuyu District issued a yellow warning signal for strong winds at 22:22 on December 26, 2024: Affected by cold air, it is expected that there will be northeasterly gales of 8 to 9 in Xiuyu District, Meizhou Island and the north coast in the next 12 hours. Please take precautions! Defense Guide: 1. The government and relevant departments shall do a good job in preventing strong winds in accordance with their duties; 2. Stop outdoor activities and outdoor dangerous operations such as high altitude, and people in dangerous areas and residents of dangerous houses shall try to move to shelters; 3. Water operations and passing ships in relevant waters shall take active response measures, strengthen port facilities, and prevent ships from breaking anchor, running aground and colliding; 4. Cut off outdoor dangerous power supplies, properly place outdoor items that are easily affected by strong winds, and cover building materials; 5. Airports, highways and other units shall take measures to ensure traffic safety, and relevant departments and units shall pay attention to fire prevention in forests and grasslands.
